jobicade.util.geom

Class Size

  • java.lang.Object
    • jobicade.util.geom.Point
      • jobicade.util.geom.Size
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Size
extends Point
    A special type of point that represents a difference or size between two points, for example the size of a rectangle.
    See Also:
    Rect, Serialized Form

        public Point withWidth(int width)
        Returns a size with a new width. Height does not change.
